arts.ttl: Paul Kendrick's player ratings - Wigan Athletic v Bolton Wanderers - ‘...dominant force in midfield...’
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic side that lost 1-0 against Bolton Wanderers at the Brick Community Stadium and delivers his report card.

arts.ttl: Glenn Whelan on Ryan Lowe's red card and Wigan Athletic's loss to Bolton Wanderers
arts.sum: Glenn Whelan admitted the stoppage-time defeat to Bolton Wanderers - which ended more than a decade of derby dominance - was a real 'sucker punch' for Wigan Athletic.

arts.ttl: Bolton bag added-time winner to record rare victory against Wigan
Ryan Lowe sees red as Wigan Athletic's derby dominance over Bolton Wanderers ends
arts.sum: A stoppage-time goal from Chris Forino handed Wigan Athletic their first derby defeat to Bolton Wanderers in more than a decade – with boss Ryan Lowe shown a red card in the dying seconds.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic star aiming to ramp up pressure on Bolton Wanderers
arts.sum: Ollie Norburn has urged Wigan Athletic to ramp up the pressure on Bolton Wanderers tonight - and continue the recent derby dominance.

arts.ttl: Sheehan and Randall back in: Bolton Wanderers team news and predicted XI to face Wigan Athletic
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers are back in League One action on Tuesday evening with an away trip to Wigan Athletic.… The post Sheehan and Randall back in: Bolton Wanderers team news and predicted XI to face Wigan Athletic appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss Ryan Lowe on facing Bolton Wanderers - and best pal Steven Schumacher
arts.sum: Ryan Lowe admits he can't wait to get stuck into his first derby day as Wigan Athletic head coach - with the added spice of best pal Steven Schumacher being in charge of Bolton Wanderers.

arts.ttl: Why speed is of the essence for Ryan Lowe's Wigan Athletic - 'It works...I know it works...'
arts.sum: Ryan Lowe is determined not to waste any time in implementing his ideas for how he wants Wigan Athletic play.

arts.ttl: Lowe determined to get to bottom of Wigan Athletic injury misfortune
arts.sum: Ryan Lowe says he's determined to get to the bottom of Wigan Athletic's ongoing injury woes.

arts.ttl: Bolton Wanderers post £11.2million losses in financial accounts for June 2024
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers' losses have increased two-fold to £11.2million after missing out on promotion to the Championship at Wembley in May.
